text: nāṁ malakkukaḷēāṭ niṅṅaḷ ādamin praṇāmaṁ ceyyuka enn paṟañña sandarbhaṁ (śrad'dhēyamatre.) avar praṇāmaṁ ceytu. iblīs oḻike. avan jinnukaḷil peṭṭavanāyirunnu. aṅṅane tanṟe rakṣitāvinṟe kalpana avan dhikkariccu. ennirikke niṅṅaḷ enne viṭṭ avaneyuṁ avanṟe santatikaḷeyuṁ rakṣādhikārikaḷākkukayāṇēā? avar niṅṅaḷuṭe śatrukkaḷatre. akramikaḷkk (allāhuvin‌) pakaraṁ kiṭṭiyat vaḷare cītta tanne
